description.value:
Rite of Heritage
Mystic Rite • Level 2

Time: 1 hour
Cost: 3 Gnosis
Requirement: The willing subject of the Rite, or a personal item strongly tied to their lineage

Description

The Rite of Heritage calls upon ancestral and blood spirits to reveal the spiritual lineage of an individual. Through this Rite, the Garou seek understanding of where a creature comes from — not in names and dates, but in spiritual inheritance.

This Rite does not judge. It reveals.

Effect

When the Gnosis cost is paid, the Rite succeeds automatically.

Choose one willing creature present during the Rite. The Garou gains clear spiritual insight into the subject's heritage, including:

  • Whether the subject possesses Garou blood or a latent supernatural lineage
  • The subject's breed origin (if Garou)
  • Whether the subject's lineage carries notable spiritual significance, taint, or blessing

This information is conveyed through visions, sensations, or symbolic imagery rather than exact factual detail.

Mechanical Clarifications

The Rite:

  • Does not reveal class, level, or abilities
  • Does not identify curses, diseases, or conditions
  • Does not expose secrets unrelated to lineage
  • The Rite provides spiritual truth, not genealogical records
  • The Storyteller determines the level of detail revealed

Limitations

This Rite:

  • Cannot be used on an unwilling creature
  • Does not bypass effects that explicitly conceal lineage or origin through powerful magic
  • Cannot be used to track or locate a creature

Narrative Use

The Rite of Heritage is often used to:

  • Confirm Garou lineage
  • Resolve disputes of identity
  • Identify lost kin or spiritual heirs
  • Determine whether a newborn should receive the Baptism of Fire

It carries no mechanical advantage beyond knowledge.

"Blood remembers what names forget."
